This page contains an outline of the topics, content, and assignments for the term. Note that this schedule will be updated as the term progresses and the timeline of topics and assignments might be updated. Any major changes to due dates will be announced in class and indicated in **bold** here.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false

library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
gs4_deauth()
d <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MY4RBHRrQP-pKAQNE-r0HRVn8gEdwfsondZJI71kf60/edit?usp=sharing")

```

```{r}
#| echo: false

d |>
  select(-Notes) |>
  mutate(date = as.Date(date)) |>
  rowwise() |>
  mutate(materials = ifelse(date <= today() + days(1), materials, "tbd")) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_date(date, date_style = 31) |>
  sub_missing(columns = c(week, prepare, topic, materials, due), missing_text = "") |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center", 
    columns = c(week)
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "right", 
    columns = c(date)
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "left", 
    columns = c(topic, prepare, materials, due)
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "right",
      color = "#D3D3D3",
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(date, topic, prepare, materials)
    )
  ) |>
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = c(topic, prepare, materials, due)
  ) |>
  cols_width(
    week ~ px(45),
    date ~ px(100), 
    prepare ~ px(300),
    topic ~ px(300),
    materials ~ px(150),
    due ~ px(300)
  ) |>
  cols_label_with(fn = function(x) {
      janitor::make_clean_names(x, case = "title") |>
        toupper() |>
        stringr::str_replace_all("^|$", "**") |>
        md()
    }) |>
  tab_options(table.font.size = 13) |>
  opt_row_striping()
```
